page.title: 03LUCKY OF ABBOTS MORTON.
page.content: {LUCKY }lived at Abbots Morton Post Office.{Lucky}was a black tom cat and he had been a stray.The post mistress had him for 8 years.He had a swollen tummy. One day two robbers came into the Post Office.They had motor-bike clothes and helmets.The men started asking the post mistress for money.{Lucky}was under the chair,he jumped onto the table and dug his claws into one of the men's bottoms!The man screamed and they ran away.{Lucky}went on all the television programmes.He got letters from other countries.A cushion with { {LUCKY}on it was made for him and he had a special cartoon and a certificate"D.F.C."Distinguished Feline Conduct.Later that year,in November,{Lucky}was run over outside his home.
